text: Serius Jones is an American and all-time champion freestyle rapper. He has been featured in many rap battles and is a part time amateur rapper. ==Discography== *2006: King Me (Street Album) *2008: Serius Bizness *2009: Why So Serius? *2011: Serius Bizness 2 *Coming 2012: Life is Serius == References == *http://www.hiphopdx.com/index/news/id.8141/title.serius-jones-speaks-on- split-with-ludacris-new-deal *http://realtalkny.uproxx.com/2007/05/topic/topic/videos/fight-klub- season-2-taping-june-4th/ *http://www.mtv.com/bands/m/mixtape_monday/012907/ == Other websites == * * Youtube channel Category:1982 births Category:Living people Category:Musicians from New Jersey
title: Serius Jones
